name: Wpintl
body:
## Any patent law firms can file a patent application. W&P provides unique value propositions.
We are a small firm. So we can provide customized solutions to you. We respond much quicker than big law firms. We offers flexibility.

We have offices in US and China. So you can look for us virtually 24 hours a day, regardless which timezone you are located.

Expertise. We specialize in US and China laws. So you can rely on us providing professional knowledge.

Language skills. No small firms do it better than us in writing Chinese/English specifications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
